mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_table (payment_id, res_id, state, type, price, created_at) VALUES (#{paymentId}, #{resId}, #{state}, #{type}, #{price}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE payment_table SET res_id=#{resId}, state=#{state}, type=#{type}, price=#{price}, created_at=#{createdAt} WHERE payment_id = ${paymentId}
